remarks: Closure lemma for ~ dvmptcmul and other related theorems.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvmptadd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptadd.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptadd.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptadd.da $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptcl $p |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. CC ) $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
